title: This Sneaker Is Actually a $3,800 Gaming PC
description: Hardware company Cooler Master is bringing a footwear-shaped gaming PC to the masses in the U.S. and Europe. Is this shoe worth the spend?

title: BitMEX Research Explores the Delayed Fallout of Rising Interest Rates: A Comprehensive Analysis
description: Introduction BitMEX Research recently published a blog post focusing on the U.S. economy and the delayed impact of higher interest rates. Despite a decline in U.S. inflation rates and a rise in interest rates to more traditional levels, the blog argues that the real consequences of these changes have yet to manifest. title: Uptober Begins: Bitcoin’s Rally Sparks $40K Hopes; Yet $20K Threat Lingers
description: The price of bitcoin (BTC) has risen 6% over the previous 30 days, pushed higher by factors such as its finite availability and growing investor confidence, according to this week’s Bitfinex Alpha report. title: BTC optimism sparks as exchange supply hits 6-year low
description: Bitcoin breeds a wave of cautious optimism among traders following the breach above $28,000, as supply on exchanges hit a six-year low amid high whale activity.
